item.description:
This is for all skill levels - so donâ€™t be afraid beginners!!! They are reasonably priced and have all the equipment and trainers onsite. If you would like to become a certified belayer let me know and we can go an hour early to get you trained. It's not hard and a good idea for a few of us to get the training.

Carabiner's Indoor Climbing opened in December 2004 as a brand-new climbing facility designed from the ground up to offer a unique indoor climbing experience.

They are a full-service gym offering climbing, instruction and a high level of service for all levels of ability and age. In addition, they have facilities for weight training, cardio equipment, locker rooms, rental equipment, and pro shop.

This is a kid-friendly event ...
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the Front Desk for The Meetup Group

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Indoor Rock Wall Climbing @ Caribiners In New Bedford
